org.elephant.mapper
Class Room

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.awt.geom.RectangularShape
        |
        +--java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D
              |
              +--java.awt.Rectangle
                    |
                    +--org.elephant.mapper.Room
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, EleMappable, java.io.Serializable, java.awt.Shape
public class Room
extends java.awt.Rectangle
implements EleMappable

The Room class defines a room object, one of the two basic components of the map. It holds all the information required to paint a room on the map and also build a room in LPC.

Copyright (c) 2001

See Also:
